linux.synopsis: Synchronized Clock Offset and PMU Phasor Monitoring System
linux.description: The Synchronized Clock Offset and PMU Phasor Monitoring System is an advanced solution designed to ensure precise time synchronization and real-time monitoring of phasor measurement units (PMUs). This system addresses critical needs in power system operations by providing accurate clock offset detection and comprehensive PMU phasor data analysis.
